keywords.description: Moves value from adress/constant/register to a register or adress.

keywords.name: int
keywords.chs: 软件中断指令（中断调用指令），[常见中断表]( https://github.com/xsro/masm-tasm/wiki/interrupt)

keywords.name: iret
keywords.chs: 中断返回指令，从堆栈中依次弹出3个字，分别装入IP、CS和FLAG标志寄存器

keywords.name: include
keywords.description: Includes a file in this file

keywords.name: shl
keywords.description: Moves all the bits to the left by the second operand.

keywords.name: xchg
keywords.description: Exchages regeter or memeory address with register.

keywords.name: xadd
keywords.description: Exchages regeter or memeory address with register and the summary is moved to SI.

keywords.name: sal
keywords.description: Moves all the bits to the left by the second operand. (Signed)

keywords.name: lea
keywords.description: Moves the memory address of operand 2 to operand 1.

keywords.name: shr
keywords.description: Moves all the bits to the right by the second operand.

keywords.name: sar
keywords.description: Moves all the bits to the right by the second operand. (Unsigned)

keywords.name: not
keywords.description: Flips all the bits of the operand

keywords.name: equ
keywords.description: Replaces all instances of name with value

keywords.name: ife
keywords.description: If the value is not zero

keywords.name: rept
keywords.description: Repeats an action a ciretien of times

keywords.name: else
keywords.description: Accurs if the if statement before didn't

keywords.name: add
keywords.description: Adds the second operand to the first one.
keywords.chs: 将第二个操作数加到第一个操作数.

keywords.name: sub
keywords.description: Subtracts the second operand from the first one.
keywords.chs: 第一个操作数减去第二个操作数.

keywords.name: neg
keywords.description: Negates the value of the operand.

keywords.name: abs
keywords.description: Turns the value to a positive value. (Not supported)

keywords.name: div
keywords.description: Divides ax by the operand (Unsigned) {Mod at dx (16 bit) or ah (8 bit)}.

keywords.name: idiv
keywords.description: Divides ax by the operand (Signed) {Mod at dx (16 bit) or ah (8 bit)}.

keywords.name: daa
keywords.description: After addition ajusts al to be in range of a decimal number

keywords.name: das
keywords.description: After subtraction ajusts al to be in range of a decimal number

keywords.name: wait
keywords.description: Processor suspends instruction execution until the BUSY # pin is inactive

keywords.name: fwait
keywords.description: Processor checks for pending unmasked numeric exceptions before proceeding.

keywords.name: push
keywords.description: pushes a value to the stack

keywords.description: pushes flag data to the stack

keywords.name: pushfw
keywords.description: pushes flag data to the stack

keywords.name: pushfd
keywords.description: pushes flag data to the stack

keywords.name: pop
keywords.description: pops a value from the stack

keywords.name: popf
keywords.description: pops flag data to the stack

keywords.name: popfw
keywords.description: pops flag data to the stack

keywords.name: popfd
keywords.description: pops flag data to the stack

keywords.name: pusha
keywords.description: pushes all register to the stack

keywords.name: popa
keywords.description: pops all register to from the stack stack

keywords.name: jmp
keywords.description: jump to a part in the code
keywords.chs: 跳转到给定标号的指令

keywords.name: jz
keywords.description:
jump if zero flag on

jump if equal
keywords.chs:
假如z标为1跳转

相等时跳转

keywords.name: jnz
keywords.description:
jump if zero flag off

jump if not equal
keywords.chs:
假如z标为0跳转

不相等时跳转

keywords.name: jc
keywords.description:
jump if less (Unsinged)

jump if carry flag on

keywords.name: jnc
keywords.description:
jump if greater or equals(Unsigned)

jump if carry flag off

keywords.description: Turns the procedure into a far procedure

keywords.name: near
keywords.description: Turns the procedure into a near procedure

keywords.name: lfs
keywords.description: Load memory from FS:Pointer 1 to operand 2 from fs

keywords.name: lgs
keywords.description: Load memory from GS:Pointer 1 to operand 2 from gs

keywords.name: lss
keywords.description: Load memory from SS:Pointer to operand 2 from ss

keywords.name: rep
keywords.chs: Repeat while equals 相等时重复

keywords.name: repz
keywords.chs: Repeat while zero 不等于零的时候重复

keywords.name: repnz
keywords.chs: Repeat while not zero 非零时重复

keywords.chs: Table lookup to al al表查找

keywords.name: bound
keywords.description: Check the 16-bit signed array index value in the operand 1 against the doubleword with the upper and lower bounds specified by operand 2

keywords.name: scas
keywords.description: Compare ES:DI with AX or AL

keywords.name: loop
keywords.description:
- decrease `CX`

- Jumps to a label if cx is not 0

keywords.name: loopz
keywords.description:
- decrease `CX`

- Jumps to a label if cx is not 0 **and** Zero flag is 1

keywords.name: loopnz
keywords.description:
- decrease `CX`

- Jumps to a label if cx is not 0 **and** zero flag is not 1
